main event: Unidentified object observed as a solid circular object descending rapidly with intermittent flashing and apparent heatwaves surrounding object in Bloomingdale, Indiana at approximately 21:00 hrs on 7 July 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as a solid circular shape with intermittent flashing,The object appeared to have heatwaves surrounding it,Several witnesses observed the object,There were no known aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting,The object was lost to sight when it came between the observers and itself.
